author: CBS News
title: Shake Shack returning $10 million virus-linked small business loan
description: Burger chain says it got extra money through an "equity transaction" so it's giving back the funds it got through the CARES Act for other eateries to use
content:
The burger chain Shake Shack says it has obtained new funding and will return a small-business loan it got to help weather the coronavirus crisis. 
Shake Shack has laid off or furloughed hundreds of its employees and needed the assistance, its CEO, Randy Gar… [+1746 chars]
